meanings.definition: Of or relating to the lower part of the abdomen.
meanings.sent1: The hypogastric area is the lower part of the belly.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often examine the hypogastric region during abdominal check-ups.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her hypogastric region was like a hidden treasure chest.
meanings.sent4: The hypogastric discomfort felt like a weight pulling downwards.
meanings.sent5: The hypogastric pain was sharp and persistent, making it hard to ignore.

meanings.sent1: The hypogastric organs are located beneath the stomach.
meanings.sent2: The surgeon focused on the hypogastric area during the operation.
meanings.sent3: The hypogastric position of the organs made the surgery more challenging.
meanings.sent4: Her anxiety felt like a heavy burden in the hypogastric region.
meanings.sent5: The hypogastric placement of the tumor required delicate precision to remove.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the region of the body below the navel.
meanings.sent1: The hypogastric pain was sharp and intense.
meanings.sent2: She felt a strange sensation in her hypogastric area.
meanings.sent3: The hypogastric discomfort made her regret eating too much.
meanings.sent4: His hypogastric region seemed to hold all his worries.
meanings.sent5: The hypogastric region was tender to the touch, indicating inflammation.
